  var pathname = "comics/leaderboard?" + type[i];
  var method = "GET";

  var headers = getheaders(setTime, nonce, signature).replace(/\"/g, '\\\"');
  var url = "https://api.manhuapica.com/" + pathname + ",{\\\"method\\\":\\\"GET\\\",\\\"headers\\\":{" + headers + "}}";
  exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 0x1, 0.25, ![]));
}
exploreUrl.splice(0x0, 0x0, explore("༺ˇ»`ʚ 　  ✨排行榜✨  　 ɞ´«ˇ༻", '', 0x1, 0x1, ![]));

<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

exploreUrl:
<js>
//状态
novelState = [
	{	title: '全部', type: 0},
	{	title: '连载', type: 1},
	{	title: '完结', type: 2}
]
//分类
novelSort = [
	{	title: '　全部　', type: 0},
	{	title: '玄幻奇幻', type: 1},
	{	title: '仙侠武侠', type: 2},
	{	title: '都市言情', type: 3},
	{	title: '穿越历史', type: 4},
	{	title: '科幻灵异', type: 5},
	{	title: '  藏经阁  ', type: 6},
	{	title: '其他类别', type: 7}
]
//排序
novelRank = [
	{ title: '  更新  ', type: 'lastupdate'},
	{ title: '总人气', type: 'allvisit'},
	{ title: '月人气', type: 'monthvisit'},
	{ title: '  字数  ', type: 'size'},
	{ title: '  新书  ', type: 'postdate'}
]

list = [];
formatUrl = (sort, rank, state) => {
	return `{{eval(String(source.loginUrl));_getUrl();}}shuku/${sort}-${rank}-${state}-{{page}}.html`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (stateItem of novelState) {
	pushItem(`🚫小说状态---${stateItem.title}🚫`, "", 1);
	for (rankItem of novelRank) {
		novelSort[0].title = "📫" + rankItem.title;
		for (sortItem of novelSort) {
			pushItem(`${sortItem.title}`, formatUrl(sortItem.type, rankItem.type, stateItem.type), sortItem.type > 5 ? 0.45 : 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>
header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

"); //x(//g,""); //d("正文"+baseUrl) try { // Aes解密 secret = src.match(/=\s*secret\(\s*['"](.+?)['"],[\s]*['"](.+?)['"],[^);]*?/); string = secret[1] code = java.md5Encode(secret[2]); iv = code.substring(0, 16); key = code.substring(16); //java.log(baseUrl + " Aes解密ok：" + code + "\n" + iv + "\n" + key) result = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(string); } catch (err) { try { // 乱序恢复 //有问题修改下面正则 修正两个br标签换行显示 x(/(\s*){2}/g,"

"); ns = java.base64Decode(src.match(/var ns='(.+?)';/)[1]).split(','); //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复ok") paragraphArr = result.split("

"); result = ""; paragraphLength = paragraphArr.length for (i = 1; i <= paragraphLength; i++) { result += paragraphArr[ns[i] - ns[0]] + '

'; } } catch (err) { //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复&Aes解密no") } } //初始化图片链接 x(/[\r\n]?[\t ]*]+>[\t ]*[\r\n]?/g, "#$1#"); //初始化字体格式的文字,匹配 x(/(.*?)<\/i>/g, function(str, p1) { //java.log(p1.charCodeAt().toString(16)); //返回16进制，例：p1= 返回格式#e800# return '#' + p1.charCodeAt().toString(16) + '#' }) //转换空格 x(/ /g, ' '); //初始化分段准备 x(/[\t  ]{2,2}/g, "　"); //去掉标签里的属性 x(/(\<|<)([^\>]*?)(\s| )[^\>]*(\>|>)/g, "<$2>"); //段落换行 x(/\s*(\n|)+\s*(　{2,})?/gi, "\r\n"); //去掉不需要的标签 x(/([\r\n　]*\<\/?([A-Za-z]*)?\>[\r\n　]*)/gi, ""); //引号替换 x(/‘/g, "『"); x(/’/g, "』"); x(/“/g, "「"); x(/”/g, "」"); if (/(Undefined|(^\s*$))/.test(result)) { result = "

" + result; } //d("正文"+baseUrl) "\r\n" + result + "hereispagebreak";

javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

 var srf=title.replace(/ /g,"　");
 var fdr=title.replace(/[0-9]+[\s|\u3000]/g,"");
 var dff=src.replace(new RegExp(arr,"g"),"");
 var dfc=dff.replace(new RegExp("\n.{1,7}"+fdr,"g"),"");
 result=dfc.replace(new RegExp(srf,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(srt,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfn,"g"),"").replace(new RegExp(sfc,"g"),"");
</js>

	源网址后面不要加##，没做兼容
	
	发布页
	https://5m6m7m8m.com/

*/
exploreUrl:
<js>
//状态
novelState = [
	{	title: '全部', type: 0},
	{	title: '连载', type: 1},
	{	title: '完结', type: 2}
]
//分类
novelSort = [
	{	title: '　全部　', type: 0},
	{	title: '玄幻奇幻', type: 1},
	{	title: '仙侠武侠', type: 2},
	{	title: '都市言情', type: 3},
	{	title: '穿越历史', type: 4},
	{	title: '科幻灵异', type: 5},
	{	title: '  藏经阁  ', type: 6},
	{	title: '其他类别', type: 7}
]
//排序
novelRank = [
	{ title: '  更新  ', type: 'lastupdate'},
	{ title: '总人气', type: 'allvisit'},
	{ title: '月人气', type: 'monthvisit'},
	{ title: '  字数  ', type: 'size'},
	{ title: '  新书  ', type: 'postdate'}
]

list = [];
formatUrl = (sort, rank, state) => {
	return `{{eval(String(source.loginUrl));_getUrl();}}shuku/${sort}-${rank}-${state}-{{page}}.html`;
}
pushItem = (title, url, basis) => {
	list.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
			layout_flexGrow: 1,
			layout_flexBasisPercent: basis
		}
	});
}

for (stateItem of novelState) {
	pushItem(`🚫小说状态---${stateItem.title}🚫`, "", 1);
	for (rankItem of novelRank) {
		novelSort[0].title = "📫" + rankItem.title;
		for (sortItem of novelSort) {
			pushItem(`${sortItem.title}`, formatUrl(sortItem.type, rankItem.type, stateItem.type), sortItem.type > 5 ? 0.45 : 0.25);
		}
	}
}
JSON.stringify(list);
</js>
header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookinfo_intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?'第{{$.chapterid}}章 ':'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
l=lock?'[锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';
</js>

<js>
m=java.getElements('#searchmain@class.searchTopic');
n=java.getElements('#searchmain@class.searchInfo');
list = [];
for(i in m){
	con = {};
	con.n= String(m[i].select('.searchtitle').text())
	.replace(/《|》|txt.*/g,'')
	con.k = n[i].select('a').get(0).text();
	con.l = n[i].select('.oldDate').text();
	con.w = String(n[i].ownText()).replace(/.*大小：|日期.*/g,'');
	con.b = n[i].select('a').get(1).attr('href');
	list.push(con);
	}
list
</js>
ruleSearch.name: n

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
n=result.match(/第1页 \/ 共(\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
var n = parseInt(n);
ul=java.getString('ul a.0@href');
ui=baseUrl.match(/(.*\/\/[^\/]+)\//)[1];

for(var i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	url=ui+String(ul).replace(/page=1/,"page="+i);
	me='第'+i+'页';
	list.push({"text":me,"href":url});
}
list
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: h2.0@text
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
u='■';nu='□'
m=baseUrl.split('/')
s=[1,{id:m[6],name:m[4],host:m[4],url:baseUrl}]
o=java.getElement('#chapterlist@div[style].0@a')
x=book.getVariable("custom")
for(i in o){
	m=o[i].attr('href').split('/')
	s.push({id:m[4],name:o[i].text(),host:m[2],url:source.key+o[i].attr('href')})
}
if(x!=''){n=Number(x);r=s[n];if(r.id){s[0]=n;java.toast('切换到源"'+r.host+'"');result=java.ajax(r.url);java.setContent(result)}else{java.toast('没有编号为"'+x+'"的源')}}
info=''
for(i=1;i<s.length;i++){
	info+=(s[0]==i?u:nu)+i+'：'+s[i].name+'\n'
}
java.put('info',info)
s=s[s[0]]
java.put('bookid',s.id)
java.put('source',s.host)
toc=result.match(/url\s*=\s*'(.+?)'/)[1]
tocData=java.get(source.key+toc,{referer:String(s.url)}).body()
if(!tocData||tocData==''){
	java.toast('目录被吃掉了！！')
}else{
	tocData=JSON.parse(tocData)
 tocData=tocData.oridata||tocData.data
 tocData=tocData.split('-//-').map(v=>{v=v.split('-/-');return {i:v[0],cid:v[1],title:v[2],vip:v[3]}})
 if(s.host=='uukanshu')tocData.reverse()
 java.put('last',tocData[tocData.length-1].title)
 java.put('toc',toc)
 java.put('tocData',JSON.stringify(tocData))
}
result
</js>.container

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property="og:novel:lastest_chapter_name"]@content&&[property="og:novel:update_time"]@content##\n20(.*)\s.*## · $1
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>
result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
.replace(/(第\d+章)\s\d+(.*)/,'$1$2')
</js>

gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>
